definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)

sentences.english: You can update the status of a command item in the menubar or toolbar.
sentences.chinese: 您可以更新的菜單欄或工具欄命令的項目的狀態。

sentences.english: The toolbars and menu bar are configured on a per-perspective basis.
sentences.chinese: 工具欄和菜單欄都是基於透視圖配置的。

sentences.english: Once attached, the custom menu bar replaces the built-in menu bar for the form or report.
sentences.chinese: 附加的自定義菜單欄將替換窗體或報表的內置菜單欄。

sentences.english: Once attached, the custom menu bar replaces the built-in menu bar for the form or report.
sentences.chinese: 附加的自定義菜單欄將替換窗體或報表的內置菜單欄。

sentences.english: Indicates that your application contains a draggable menu bar and a toolbar.
sentences.chinese: 指示應用程序包含可拖動的菜單欄和工具欄。

sentences.english: To complete the menu bar, add custom menus or built-in menus.
sentences.chinese: 若要完成菜單欄，請添加自定義菜單或內置菜單。

sentences.english: You can also use this dialog box to customize the built-in menu bar and tool bars.
sentences.chinese: 也可以使用該對話框自定義內置菜單欄和工具欄。

sentences.english: Drag any scope element from the main menu bar onto the requirement.
sentences.chinese: 從主菜單欄中拖動任意範圍元素到需求上。

sentences.english: A list of sub-menu items will be placed within the menubar shell.
sentences.chinese: 二級菜單項目列表會在菜單欄位置顯示。

sentences.english: Typically, the menus are displayed in a menubar at the top of the screen.
sentences.chinese: 一般地，菜中顯示在屏幕頂部的菜單欄中。

sentences.english: Move the mouse pointer to the menu bar.
sentences.chinese: 將羾鼠標光標移向菜單欄。

definition: summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
